All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AgeValidator
A class that checks if the age of a client is between 18 and 100 - if it is not, if throws an exception.
CantitateValidator
A class that checks if there is enough quantity for a new order - if it is not, if throws an exception.
Client
This class contains all the details about the clients.
ClientBLL
This class is used to check the values from the interface and to call other methods if some conditions are met.
ClientDAO
This class has different methods for queries: insert, findbyid, findall, update and delete.
ConnectionFactory
This class is used for the connection to the db.
Controller
It controls the data flow into a model object and updates the view whenever data changes
EmailValidator
A class that checks if the email of a client matches a specific pattern - if it is not, if throws an exception.
IdProductValidator
A class that checks if the id of a product is smaller than 1 - if it is, if throws an exception.
IdValidator
A class that checks if the id of a client is smaller than 1 - if it is, if throws an exception.
Order
This class contains all the details about the orders.
OrderBLL
This class is used to check the values from the interface and to call other methods if some conditions are met.
OrderDAO
This class has different methods for queries: insert, findbyid and findall.
PretValidator
A class that checks if the price of a product is smaller than 0 - if it is, if throws an exception.
Product
This class contains all the details about the products.
ProductBLL
This class is used to check the values from the interface and to call other methods if some conditions are met.
ProductDAO
This class has different methods for queries: insert, findbyid, findall, update and delete.

Start
The main class for this project.

An interface used for the validating part.
View
It displays the information from the model to the user.

It displays the information from the model to the user.

It displays the information from the model to the user.

It displays the information from the model to the user.
